Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ActionRequest
    This message identifies a request for a basic turn action
    AskProductionReply
    This message identifies the available cards for production after requesting a production action.
    AskProductionRequest
    This message identifies the chosen cards to activate for a production action.
    BuyDevCardReply
    This message is sent if the player is allowed to buy a devcard.
    BuyDevCardRequest
    This message identifies which color and level of card the player wants to buy
    ClientMessage
    This interface is provided for all messages sent by the client
    ErrorMsg
    This message sends a generic string to signal an error or unavailable action
    GeneralMessage
    This class is used for all messages to allow serialization
    GetMarketResReply
    This message sends the player's available empty marble conversions and allows to buy from marble market.
    GetMarketResRequest
    This message contains the chosen row or column of the marble market and the chosen conversion
    GetProductionReply
    This message contains the player's strongbox and warehouse, the resource cost and how many ANY resources need to be paid or produced, after choosing production cards.
    GetProductionRequest
    This meessage contains the resources that need to be spent from the warehouse and the new strongbox after the expenses.
    HostGameReply
    This message identifies a request from the server to chose the number of players.
    LeaderActionRequest
    This message contains the leader card chosen for a leader action and if it was chosen to play or discard.
    LoginReply
    Identifies if a login was succesful
    LoginRequest
    This message identifies a request from a client to join a game.
    LoseMessage
    This message notifies a loss in a single player game
    PlaceDevCardReply
    This message contains the price of a devcard and the resources of the player, and also the available slots for the bought devcard to be placed.
    PlaceDevCardRequest
    This message identifies the expenses from the warehouse, the new strongbox after expense and the chosen slot to place a devcard after a buy dev card action.
    PlayersNumberRequest
    This message contains the number of players requested for a hosted game
    ResourceToWarehouseReply
    This message requests the player to place resources in the warehouse,
    ResourceToWarehouseRequestMsg
    This message contains the new warehouse state of a player.
    ServerMessage
    This interface is provided for all messages sent by the Server
    ShowDevMarketMsg
    This message contains the data of the devcardMarket
    ShowFaithTrackMsg
    This message contains the data of the FaithTrack
    ShowLeaderCardsMsg
    This message contains the data of the player's leader Cards.
    ShowMarketMsg
    This message contains the data of the Marble Market
    ShowPlayedLeadersMsg
    This message contains the data of the Played Leader Cards.
    ShowPlayerFaithMsg
    This message contains the player's faith
    ShowPlayerListMsg  
    ShowPlayerReply
    This message contains the data of a player
    ShowPlayerRequest
    This message contains the requested player's username
    ShowPlayerTurnMsg  
    ShowSlotsMsg
    This message contains the data of the Player's devcardslot
    ShowStrongboxMsg
    This message contains the data of the Player's strongbox
    ShowVictoryPointsMsg
    This message contains the all the player's victory points.
    ShowWarehouseMsg
    This message contains the data of the Player's warehouse
    SideLeaderReply
    This message contains the player's leader cards that can be played or discarded
    StartingLeadersReplyMsg
    This message contains the drawn leader cards at the start of the game
    StartingLeadersRequestMsg
    This message contains the chosen leader cards to keep at the start.
    StartTurnReply
    This message notifies a player that it's their turn
    StringMessage
    this message contains a generic string.
    WinMessage
    This message contains the sorted hashmap of all players and victory points after the game ends.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    MessageType
    Enum class of all different message types.
